properties.name: settings.developer
properties.description: Developer's Telegram nickname. Must starts without @, e.g BigDickBoy.

properties.name: settings.yandex-key
properties.description: Token for translating. Allowed to be empty, but translations will not work. You can get it there: https://yandex.com/dev/translate/.

properties.name: settings.bot-name
properties.description: Bot's Telegram nickname. Must starts without @, e.g FamilyBot.

properties.name: settings.payment-token
properties.description: Payment token, you can get it from @BotFather. Optional.
